document.full_text: russia won the right to stage the 2016 world ice hockey championship on friday, the latest in a series of international sporting events to be awarded to the world's largest country.
document.title: russia to host 2016 world championship
lines_and_colors: russia won the right to stage the 2016 world ice hockey championship on friday, the latest in a series of international sporting events to be awarded to the world's largest country.
